title: Why public beheadings get millions of views
description: In a disturbing — but fascinating — walk through history, Frances Larson examines humanity's strange relationship with public executions … and specifically beheadings. As she shows us, they have always drawn a crowd, first in the public square and now on YouTube. What makes them horrific and compelling in equal measure?
author: Frances Larson
keywords: TED, talks, death, global issues, history, online video
